alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 07 at 8:52PM CDT until May 13 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Big River at Byrnesville. Meramec River at Pacific. Meramec River near Eureka. Bourbeuse River at Union. Meramec River near Arnold. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River at Fenton. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Arnold. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Wells Road below Suson Woods begins flooding at this height. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 29.2 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CDT Saturday was 29.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 30.0 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 7 pm Sun Mon Tue Wed Thu Meramec River Arnold 24.0 29.2 29.9 30.0 29.0 25.1 21.5 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
